comments.text:
The problem seems to be useDefaultIcon assuming that if a document is an ImageDocument, then its URL is sane.

http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/annotate/969691cfe40e/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml#l677
comments.raw_text:
The problem seems to be useDefaultIcon assuming that if a document is an ImageDocument, then its URL is sane.

http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/annotate/969691cfe40e/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml#l677
comments.creator: jruderman@gmail.com

comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.text: Hmm.  Perhaps we should make document.write fail on ImageDocuments.
comments.raw_text: Hmm.  Perhaps we should make document.write fail on ImageDocuments.
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu

comments.raw_text: I guess that would fix bug 622778, too.
